subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Peter Sagan’s fall ended his chances of catching Ramunas Navardauskas, who won Stage 19 in heavy rain. Vincenzo Nibali, the Tour de France’s overall leader, stayed out of trouble ahead of Sunday’s finish.
snippet: Peter Sagan’s fall ended his chances of catching Ramunas Navardauskas, who won Stage 19 in heavy rain. Vincenzo Nibali, the Tour de France’s overall leader, stayed out of trouble ahead of Sunday’s finish.
